mapper.insert: insert into PROJ_CALENDAR values( (select NVL(max(task_no),0)+1 from PROJ_CALENDAR), #{taskTitle}, #{projNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, (select members_no from members where members_id=#{developerId}), #{taskComplete} )
mapper.select: select task_title "title", to_char(start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') "start", to_char(end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') "end", developer_no, task_complete from PROJ_CALENDAR where proj_no=#{projNo}
select task_title "title", task_complete, developer_no, task_no, proj_no from proj_calendar where proj_no = #{projNo} and to_date(#{date},'yyyy-mm-dd') between start_date and end_date
